dev.simmons.service

Interface Bank

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Banking

    public interface Bank
    The business rules associated with the given bank.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addOwner(Account account, Client owner)
      Add an owner to the list of owners associated with an account.
      boolean closeAccount(Account account)
      Close out an account.
      boolean closeClient(Client client)
      Close out a client, remove their ownership of any accounts and closing out all solely owned accounts.

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        boolean deposit(Account account,
                double amount)
        Deposit a specified amount to a given account
        Parameters:
        account - The account object containing the current balance and account_id.
        amount - The double amount to be deposited.
        Returns:
        True if the deposit happens successfully, false otherwise.

      • withdraw

        boolean withdraw(Account account,
                 double amount)
        Withdraw a specified amount from a given account.
        Parameters:
        account - The account object containing the current balance and account_id.
        amount - The double amount to be withdrawn.
        Returns:
        True if the withdrawal is successful, false otherwise.

      • transfer

        boolean transfer(Account from,
                 Account to,
                 double amount)
        Transfer from a given account a specific amount to another account.
        Parameters:
        from - The account object containing the current balance and account_id from which the amount is being withdrawn.
        to - The account object containing the current balance and account_id to which the amount is being deposited.
        amount - The double amount to be transferred.
        Returns:
        True if the transfer is successful, false otherwise.

      • getAccountInfo

        List<Account> getAccountInfo(int clientId)
        Retrieve account information for a given client.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id for the client whose account info we want.
        Returns:
        A List containing the client's accounts, an empty list if none exist.

      • getOwners

        List<Client> getOwners(int accountId)
        Get the owners associated with a given account. Since an owner-less account should be closed, the list returned should be non-empty.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account_id for the account we're looking for the owners.
        Returns:
        A List containing the owners of a given account.

      • getClient

        Client getClient(int clientId)
        Get a client associated with a given client_id.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id associated with the user.
        Returns:
        A client object containing all the fields associated with that client.

      • getClient

        Client getClient(Client client)
        Get a client associated with a given client_id or client_username.
        Parameters:
        client - The client object with the required fields.
        Returns:
        A client object containing all the fields associated with that client.

      • getClient

        Client getClient(java.lang.String username)
        Get a client associated with a given client_username.
        Parameters:
        username - The client_username associated with the client.
        Returns:
        A client object containing all the fields associated with that client.

      • getAccount

        Account getAccount(int accountId)
        Get account information associated with a given account_id.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account_id to search for.
        Returns:
        An account object containing all the fields of the given account_id.

      • getFullAccountInfo

        List<Account> getFullAccountInfo()
        Get full account information, including complete list of owners, for all accounts currently active.
        Returns:
        A list of accounts if any are found, an empty list otherwise.

      • getAccountsSolelyOwned

        List<Account> getAccountsSolelyOwned(int clientId)
        Retrieve a list of accounts of which a given client is the sole owner.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id of the given client.
        Returns:
        A List containing the accounts.

      • getAccountsSolelyOwned

        List<Account> getAccountsSolelyOwned(Client client)
        Retrieve a list of accounts of which a given client is the sole owner.
        Parameters:
        client - The client object containing the client_id of the given client.
        Returns:
        A List containing the accounts.

      • registerClient

        boolean registerClient(Client client)
        Create a new client.
        Parameters:
        client - The client object with all the fields set representing the new client.
        Returns:
        True if the client is inserted successfully, false otherwise.

      • createAccount

        boolean createAccount(Account account,
                      Client owner)
        Open a new account.
        Parameters:
        account - The account object with all the fields set representing the new account.
        owner - The client object representing the new owner containing at least the client_id.
        Returns:
        True if the account was successfully created.

      • addOwner

        boolean addOwner(Account account,
                 Client owner)
        Add an owner to the list of owners associated with an account.
        Parameters:
        account - The account object containing the account_id.
        owner - The client object containing the new co-owner's client_id.
        Returns:
        True if the ownership was added, false otherwise.

      • removeOwner

        boolean removeOwner(Account account,
                    Client owner)
        Remove an owner from the list of owner associated with an account.
        Parameters:
        account - The account object containing the account_id.
        owner - The client object containing the former co-owner's client_id.
        Returns:
        True if the ownership was added, false otherwise.

      • closeAccount

        boolean closeAccount(Account account)
        Close out an account.
        Parameters:
        account - The account objected containing at least the account_id of the account to be closed.
        Returns:
        True if the account was successfully closed, false otherwise.

      • closeClient

        boolean closeClient(Client client)
        Close out a client, remove their ownership of any accounts and closing out all solely owned accounts.
        Parameters:
        client - The client object containing at least the client_id of the given client.
        Returns:
        True if the client was closed out successfully, false otherwise.
